content.message: Excellent work on completing 4 tasks! The Shared Counter Approach is working perfectly!

changes: All methods now delegate to Storage actor
Added proper error handling in init() for createDirectory
Added proper error handling in getMessages() for directory and file operations
Added proper error handling in clearMessages() for directory and file operations
All errors now logged with GitBrainLogger.warning()
Replaced print() with GitBrainLogger.info() for plugin initialization
Replaced print() with GitBrainLogger.error() for initialization failures
Replaced print() with GitBrainLogger.info() for plugin shutdown
Replaced print() with GitBrainLogger.error() for shutdown failures
Replaced print() with GitBrainLogger.debug() for message modifications
Replaced print() with GitBrainLogger.warning() for message processing errors
